Simple client to connect to a whois server import java.net.*; import java.io.¥*; public class Whois { public static void main(String[] args) { try { int c; Socket s = new Socket("whois.internic.net™, 43); InputStream in = s.getInputStream(); OutputStream out = s.getOutputStream(); String str = "google.com"+ "\n"; out.write(str.getBytes()); while ((c = in.read())!= =-1) System.out.print ((char)c); s.close();} catch (IOException ex) { System.err.println(ex); } o+
